legge1899.quote: the dragon lying hid (in the deep). It is not the time for active doing.

line_companion.quote: Time is everything. You have to wait for it.

01.1.why_cited: Patient incubation without premature display = Lyra creative expression held until ripe (quick_rule: 'artistic creation, aesthetic power').

legge1899.quote: the dragon appearing in the field. It will be advantageous to meet with the great man.

line_companion.quote: Somebody looks inside and sees that difference.

01.2.why_cited: Emergence + meeting the great one = initiation/ordeal pattern (Orion Light quick_rule: 'honorable trial, mystery school').

line_companion.quote: Love is light. Venus exalted as a symbol of beauty.

01.2.why_cited: Love as light + harmony between values = touches sacred instruction aspect (Sirius quick_rule: 'sacred knowledge transmission').

legge1899.quote: the superior man active and vigilant all the day, and in the evening still careful and apprehensive.

line_companion.quote: Mars exalted as the symbol of a profound need for self-expression.

01.3.why_cited: Sustained vigilance through danger + Martian endurance = honorable trial (Orion Light quick_rule: 'honorable trial, warrior initiation').

legge1899.quote: the dragon looking as if he were leaping up, but still in the deep.

line_companion.quote: Aloneness as the medium of creativity.

01.4.why_cited: Aloneness as creative medium + personal perspective outside influence = Lyra artistic creation (quick_rule: 'artistic creation, aesthetic power').

legge1899.quote: the dragon on the wing in the sky. It will be advantageous to meet with the great man.

01.5.why_cited: Attracts society's projection + powerful recognition field = Sirius shadow gatekeeping through fame (quick_rule: 'sacred knowledge transmission').

line_companion.quote: Mars exalted for its powerful ego endurance.

01.5.why_cited: Powerful ego endurance + eccentricity for attention = Draco survival through status dominance (quick_rule: 'hierarchical enforcement, loyalty control').

legge1899.quote: the dragon exceeding the proper limits. There will be occasion for repentance.

01.6.why_cited: Objective assessment of creative value across generations = Lyra immortalization through art (quick_rule: 'immortalization through beauty and art').

line_companion.quote: Mutation is a movement and it goes far beyond a single lifetime.

01.6.why_cited: Mutation as generational movement + timing perspective = Sirius timing signal for renewal (quick_rule: 'timing signal for collective renewal').
